summary: This is a U.S. Marshals Service Prisoner Custody Alert Notice for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, documenting his status as a prisoner with alerts for mental concerns and suicidal tendencies. It lists his charges of sex trafficking and conspiracy.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the prisoner custody alert notice, identified by prisoner number 7618054, with charges of sex trafficking and conspiracy under 18 USC 371, and alerts for mental concerns and suicidal tendencies.

events.title: Prisoner Custody Alert Notice Prepared
events.description: A U.S. Marshals Service Prisoner Custody Alert Notice is prepared for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, documenting his prisoner status, charges, and alerts regarding mental health and suicidal tendencies.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was a federal prisoner with the prisoner number 7618054.
Epstein was charged with sex trafficking and conspiracy under 18 USC 371.
The U.S. Marshals Service document includes alerts for 'Mental Concerns' and 'Suicidal Tendencies' regarding Epstein.
The Prisoner Custody Alert Notice was prepared on July 8, 2019.
